name: Calculated Hours for Factory Acceptance Test
action: <*ASSIGNVALUE(PAGA Factory Aceptance Test:[IF](<*ISSELECTED(PAGA_Implementation_Methodology.Non-Standard Build Estimate)*>){<* Eval(16+(16*<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_PAGA_Cabinets)*>))*>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(PAGA_Implementation_Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,<*ISSELECTED(PAGA_GES_Location.None)*>)){<* Eval(8+((16+(16*<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_PAGA_Cabinets)*>))*0.5)) *>}{[IF]([AND](<*ISSELECTED(PAGA_Implementation_Methodology.Standard Build Estimate)*>,[NEQ](<*VALUE(PAGA_GES_Location)*>,None))){<* Eval(1.15*(8+((16+(16*<*VALUE(PAGA_Number_of_PAGA_Cabinets)*>))*0.5))) *>}{0}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF]}[ENDIF])*>
